component.title: Bean
component.description: The Bean Component is for invoking Java beans from Camel.
component.label: core,java

beanName.description: Sets the name of the bean to invoke

cache.description: If enabled Camel will cache the result of the first Registry look-up. Cache can be enabled if the bean in the Registry is defined as a singleton scope.

multiParameterArray.description: How to treat the parameters which are passed from the message body; if it is true the message body should be an array of parameters. Note: This option is used internally by Camel and is not intended for end users to use.

method.description: Sets the name of the method to invoke on the bean

parameters.description: Used for configuring additional properties on the bean

exchangePattern.description: Sets the default exchange pattern when creating an exchange.

synchronous.description: Sets whether synchronous processing should be strictly used or Camel is allowed to use asynchronous processing (if supported).
